activity.text: @Jacobjeevan Approach:This patient reg form only submits if these fields are filled.so we need to remove form.ward condition from isFormValid state or the corresponding boolean state which checks form validation for final submission,also in database model ,make ward field optional by giving it a null state also Here u can see how i made phone no. optional in my freelance app made in react. ETA:2 days (To analyze db)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13079
activity.text:
@AdityaJ2305 
Approach: Create a reusable <Accordion> component with smooth transitions during toggling,proper spacing and other UI elements. Make it responsive around all devices.
I will integrate this Accordion into the Health Profile section of the Patient Home Page, specifically wrapping the Medication Statement content.
The Accordion component will be made reusable and can later be used in other areas of the application (e.g., Lab Results, Allergies) wherever collapsible sections are needed.

End Date:2 Days
